channel.title: R on Gabe Nespoli
channel.description: Recent content in R on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: An R tool for assessing when averages are stable
item.description: This is a project for assessing when averages become stable. The R scripts can be found on github at gabenespoli/resampling.

item.title: The effects of hearing aids on physiological responses to emotional speech
item.description: This project investigates the effects of hearing aids on skin conductance when hearing emotional speech. Analysis code can be found on github at gabenespoli/physiohearingaids. These scripts rely heavily on PHZLAB.
